Package map

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
map.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class for the MVC model, uses JavaFX

    • filterCycles

      private void filterCycles(double length)
      Utility method to call the createCycles method with the appropriate parameters
      Parameters:
      length - the length of the cycle to be drawn on the map

    • createCycles

      private void createCycles(double length, Integer counter, List<com.sothawo.mapjfx.CoordinateLine> pathList, List<List<Integer>> cycleList)
      Creates the cycles and calls the drawCycle method with the appropriate parameters
      Parameters:
      length - length of the cycle to be drawn
      counter - cycle ID
      pathList - list of JavaFX CoordinateLines to be drawn
      cycleList - list of cycles to be filtered and drawn

    • drawCycle

      private void drawCycle(List<Integer> cycle, Integer count)
      Adds the CoordinateLines with respect to the generated cycles to the mapView
      Parameters:
      cycle - cycle to be added to the mapView
      count - cycle ID

    • cycleLengthIsWithin

      private boolean cycleLengthIsWithin(double length, List<Integer> cycle)
      Checks if the current cycle is within the specified length
      Parameters:
      length - path length constraint
      cycle - cycle to be verified
      Returns:
      true if the cycle length is within the constraint, false otherwise

    • deleteGraph

      private void deleteGraph(Integer graphId)
      Hides a graph from the mapView
      Parameters:
      graphId - ID of the graph to be hid

    • setControlsDisable

      private void setControlsDisable(boolean flag)
      Enables or disables the map controls based on the flag parameter
      Parameters:
      flag - true if the controls should be enabled, false otherwise

    • drawAllCycles

      private void drawAllCycles(int graphId)
      Draws all the cycles from the graph with graphId when the respective button is clicked
      Parameters:
      graphId - graph's ID

    • addCyclesToMap

      private void addCyclesToMap(Graph graph, List<List<Integer>> graphCycles, List<com.sothawo.mapjfx.CoordinateLine> pathList)
      Sets all the cycles from the graph to be visible on the mapView
      Parameters:
      graph - graph to be drawn
      graphCycles - cycles to be drawn
      pathList - list of paths that constitute the predefined lines

    • afterMapIsInitialized

      private void afterMapIsInitialized()
      Creates and initializes the predefined lists after the mapView is initialized
